DOC.brief_title: Is Drainage Necessary After Total Hip Replacement ?
DOC.detailed_description: After approval local ethical committee , patient undergoing Total Hip Replacement ( THR ) include study . Patients previous hip surgery coagulation disorder include . All patient submit non-cemented Total Hip Replacement ( THR ) Hardinge 's approach . Before wound closure , nurse open envelope contain patient randomization : group 1 - closed suction drainage ( CSD ) group 2 - without closed suction drainage ( CSD ) . In group 1 , sub-fascial suction drain use , keep 24 hour . Data collect include : mid-tigh circumference 24 hour , blood transfusion , inflammatory blood marker C-Reactive Protein ( CRP ) , Erythrocyte sedimentation rate ( ESR ) leucogram , Harris Hip Score ( HHS ) 3 month , complication . Patients follow 3 month post operatively .
